CustomField.description: Applied the new pricing matrix in this formula. Please see CRM-965 for reference.
CustomField.formula: IF( AND(Application__r.Investor__r.Investor_Code__c =='ACU',Application__r.Loan_Origination_Date__c >= DATE(2020,10,12)) , IF(Term__c == 24, IF(Pricing_Tier__c == 't1', 0.0270, IF(Pricing_Tier__c == 't2', 0.0260, IF(Pricing_Tier__c == 't3', 0.0330, IF(Pricing_Tier__c == 't4', 0.0310, IF(Pricing_Tier__c == 't5', 0.0130, 0) ) ) ) ) , IF(Term__c == 36, IF(Pricing_Tier__c == 't1', 0.0440, IF(Pricing_Tier__c == 't2', 0.0440, IF(Pricing_Tier__c == 't3', 0.0410, IF(Pricing_Tier__c == 't4', 0.0290, IF(Pricing_Tier__c == 't5', 0.0000, 0) ) ) ) ) , IF(Term__c == 48, IF(Pricing_Tier__c == 't1', 0.0730, IF(Pricing_Tier__c == 't2', 0.0400, IF(Pricing_Tier__c == 't3', 0.0320, IF(Pricing_Tier__c == 't4', 0.0410, IF(Pricing_Tier__c == 't5', 0.0000, 0) ) ) ) ) , IF(Term__c == 60, IF(Pricing_Tier__c == 't1', 0.0750, IF(Pricing_Tier__c == 't2', 0.0540, IF(Pricing_Tier__c == 't3', 0.0000, IF(Pricing_Tier__c == 't4', 0.0190, IF(Pricing_Tier__c == 't5', 0.0000, 0) ) ) ) ) , 0) ) ) ) , 0)
CustomField.label: Loan_Premium_Price_ACU
